channel.title: Divination
channel.description: I wanted to get opinions on the Divination skill. This is a skill I have been struggling leveling for a while now. It stayed 75 for a long time and then just recently I got it to 85.

item.title: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Rs3advanced Rs3advanced
item.description:
@Rs3advanced wrote:

Divination is one of my favorite skills, if you have either a Light Creature or a Nighmare Muspah* - It’s very easy to train and it’s about 99% afk’able just watch netflix while you do it like any other gathering/artisan skill ;p.

*Muspah’s are awesome, i advise you get one if you don’t have one already.

Read full topic

item.title: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“jediz, post:8, topic:548771”]

Took me 2 months to get 99. Keep yourself occupied by watching netflix or something. This skill can easily burn you out if you don’t keep yourself occupied.[/quote]was 75 for ages got to 88 and bam. Burn out heh

Read full topic

item.title: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Just watch something at the same time. Divination is not very click intensive so it’s easy to concentrate on something else while still training at max efficiency. In terms of my opinion on the skill- I think it was a space filler and a complete waste of time. The rewards from the skill are pretty average although portents are p. fly

Read full topic

item.title: Divination
item.dc:creator: @jediz Sapphirus
item.description:
@jediz wrote:

Took me 2 months to get 99. Keep yourself occupied by watching netflix or something. This skill can easily burn you out if you don’t keep yourself occupied.

Read full topic

item.title: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:6, topic:548771”]It’s not that bad when you semi-afk it. I got 5-99 (due to being f2p for a little bit) in about 3 weeks. The max xp/hr is around 90-100k at the level 95 location.[/quote]It is one of those skills you can get burnt on if you aren’t careful

I had to take like a 2 day break

Read full topic

item.title: Divination
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:

item.title: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

I still have to do Fate of the Gods so it will take me even longer

Read full topic

item.title: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:548771”]I cannot stand divination. They put little to no effort into this skill.
It’s basically just Runespan, but all over the world…
They didn’t seem to put much effort into the skill being “new” since they basically took the entire concept of an already existing feature…[/quote]bahaha

this was my original thoughts on the skill when I first saw it as well.

[quote=“Elrick, post:2, topic:548771”]I hate it. The exp rates are way too low even at level 75 (where I currently am), and I really want 88 but I cbf to force myself to do it. It’s a shame though because 88 div is super useful :/. Will probably be one of the very last skills I max.[/quote]Exactly… even though to be fair you can see a somewhat increase in gathering the memories at 80. I’m 86 now and I have gotten about 1.9m xp for the entire week which is just horrid. But I went from 75-86.

Read full topic

item.title: Divination
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I cannot stand divination. They put little to no effort into this skill.
It’s basically just Runespan, but all over the world…
They didn’t seem to put much effort into the skill being “new” since they basically took the entire concept of an already existing feature…

item.title: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

I hate it. The exp rates are way too low even at level 75 (where I currently am), and I really want 88 but I cbf to force myself to do it. It’s a shame though because 88 div is super useful :/. Will probably be one of the very last skills I max.

Read full topic
